pages.text: Affects healing spells. Healing spells effects are amplified 3 levels and their effect duration is increased 100%. Affects:$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_redemption)Path of Redemption$()

pages.mod_text: Your scepter has mastered healing magics. Manifests on Redemption if you complete the Pacifists Path of Redemption
